Name: Fantasy Fighters
About the game: Fantasy Fighters is a turn-based game that allows you to play with a class of your choice in a fantasy battle setting. Each of the four classes (Elf, Dwarf, Rogue, Paladin) have three character types: Fighter (melee attack), Range (multi-target range attack) and Healer. The stats (damage, HP, healing points) of the characters are according to tier levels identified by colors. Players start with the teal level and as they progress in score through winning games will unlock higher tiers such as Orange, Blue, Red and Black. Pick your favourite class of Fantasy Fighters and win battles!
